import sys

fibmap = {1:1, 2:2}
global last 
last = 3

def fib(n):
	try:
		return fibmap[n] 
	except KeyError:
		for i in xrange(last,n+1):
			fibmap[i] = fibmap[i-1]+fibmap[i-2]
		return fibmap[n]


while 1:
	a,b = sys.stdin.readline().split()
	low = int(a)
	high = int(b)

	if  (low == 0 and high == 0):
		break

	count = 0
	i = 1
	while 1:
		if (fib(i) > low and fib(i) < high):
			count = count+1
		if (fib(i) > high):
			break
		i = i+1
	if (i > last):
		last = i;
	print count
